about_the_game:
I'm a solo developer who was bored and wanted to see if I could copy that viral clicker game, Banana, but improve upon it. After a few days of work the game was almost finished, and then after a break of several months, I finally got back to it and figured out how to do Steam drops, and thus Dogs was born! It's nothing serious and as you can tell from the achievements I'm having some fun with it. :) Dogs is the perfect game for anyone who loves our furry friends and enjoys casual, relaxing gameplay. Immerse yourself in a delightful world filled with adorable canines, where your main objective is simple: click on dogs to increase your score. 

Features:

  • Cute and Cuddly Canines: Enjoy a wide variety of dog breeds, each more adorable than the last. From fluffy Yorkies to majestic Great Danes and even Shiba Inus, there's a pup for every dog lover.

  • Simple Gameplay: All you need to do is click! Tap on the dogs as they appear on the screen to increase your score. It's easy to learn and perfect for players of all ages.

  • Relaxing Experience: With soothing background music and charming visuals, Dogs offers a stress-free environment where you can unwind and enjoy the simple pleasure of clicking on cute dogs.

  • High Score Challenge: Aim for the highest score and compete with friends and other players. Can you become the ultimate dog-clicking champion?

  • Cloud saves: Play Dogs anywhere on any computer and resume your progress with Steam Cloud Saves!
detailed_description:
I'm a solo developer who was bored and wanted to see if I could copy that viral clicker game, Banana, but improve upon it. After a few days of work the game was almost finished, and then after a break of several months, I finally got back to it and figured out how to do Steam drops, and thus Dogs was born! It's nothing serious and as you can tell from the achievements I'm having some fun with it. :) Dogs is the perfect game for anyone who loves our furry friends and enjoys casual, relaxing gameplay. Immerse yourself in a delightful world filled with adorable canines, where your main objective is simple: click on dogs to increase your score. 

Features:

  • Cute and Cuddly Canines: Enjoy a wide variety of dog breeds, each more adorable than the last. From fluffy Yorkies to majestic Great Danes and even Shiba Inus, there's a pup for every dog lover.

  • Simple Gameplay: All you need to do is click! Tap on the dogs as they appear on the screen to increase your score. It's easy to learn and perfect for players of all ages.

  • Relaxing Experience: With soothing background music and charming visuals, Dogs offers a stress-free environment where you can unwind and enjoy the simple pleasure of clicking on cute dogs.

  • High Score Challenge: Aim for the highest score and compete with friends and other players. Can you become the ultimate dog-clicking champion?

  • Cloud saves: Play Dogs anywhere on any computer and resume your progress with Steam Cloud Saves!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1060 / AMD RX580
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1060 / AMD RX580
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Dogs is a relaxing and fun game where you click on adorable dogs to increase your score. Featuring a variety of cute dog breeds, simple gameplay, and charming visuals, it's perfect for dog lovers and players of all ages.
